actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 1 of H. Res. 1230. The next meeting is scheduled for 11:00 a.m. on November 25, 2022.

Pursuant to section 803(a) of the Congressional Recognition for Excellence in Arts Education Act (2 U.S.C. 803(a)), and the order of the House of January 4, 2021, the Speaker appointed Ms. Diane Dewhirst, Washington, D.C.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 4 of H. Res. 1464, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Jamie Raskin to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
